alert.note: Alert for Baxter; Boone County Except Southwest; Boone County Higher Elevations; Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Fulton; Marion; Newton County Higher Elevations; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued April 22 at 2:56AM CDT until April 23 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32 possible. * WHERE...Marion, Baxter, Fulton, Boone County Except Southwest, Newton County Higher Elevations, Searcy County Lower Elevations, Boone County Higher Elevations, Newton County Lower Elevations, Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations and Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
